     how about this

3.22.18  1:17 pm   what is the best part about all your internet experience?

     that feeling i get when i log onto the world wide web

3.22.18  11:33 am   if you want to, i could send you an e-mail teaching how to accept bitcoin donations. it's actually not that hard. would you like me to?

     sure

3.22.18  10:49 am   so i was recording vocals in my living room the other day and i got all these different hums going on. went on the internet and somebody said that those are natural harmonics being produced in nature and that those happen in multiples and you gotta EQ them out.

     they might not know what is going on without actually hearing your recording

      so i go to EQ the point that i think the problem is at then i see that there's also a problem with another number, which i can only surmise means that there are also problems with all the multiples of that. i could throw another EQ thing on the track and get rid of those too but i feel like at that point i'm killing the life of the track. so i talked to a dude about this and he said "the acoustics in that room are shitty, those are called standing waves, you can fix that by putting absorber pads on your wall."

     that might be true

      i knew what he was talking about cuz youtube's been targeting pad ad's to me for a while now. anyway, my question is how do YOU deal with the acoustics in whatever room you record vocal s in, if you do at all. if you feel more comfortable emailing about this i wouldn't mind. i just feel like i fucked that up, so, yeah. 

     my room is almost entirely carpeted. that helps a lot. if you have a mostly non-carpeted room you are screwed. also there is a lot of stuff in here, which helps. there are pictures on the walls, etc. there is just a lot of stuff in here. there is actually a very small sound absorbing pad that i put on a blank spot on the wall but i think the effects are probably negligible. the sound seems to be ok but i've been noticing more lately that it's not perfect. someone actually once told me they thought i put reverb on the narration vocals on history of japan, but not the jingle vocals. this is backwards, there is no reverb on the narration, but a little bit on the jingles. what this tells me is that the natural room acoustics are audible on the narration because there is much less other music to mask it. but during the jingles, or full musical arrangements, it is not audible

     seems legit

     that's not true

3.21.18  10:18 pm   6.23.17  9:28 pm what happened between gtkwgo and the steve vid that there was a slow/calm song in the works for a second?

     i had picked the next song to do, but i was in the midst of re-evaluating and changing the content agenda. i switched gears and made the steve video instead

     i wouldn't call outside slow.

     that wasn't it

3.21.18  10:00 pm   why did you decide to put a timestamp on the anagrams,

     to clarify when they were made, so people don't think i was doing john mccain anagrams in 2015

     but the same color as the background, so its only visible when highlighted?

     because the date is not very important, and a little bit distracting when reading the anagrams

     did you just not want people seeing when you uploaded a specific anagram unless we really wanted to know?

     it's not the upload date, it's the creation date

     no

     yes

3.21.18  7:36 pm   how do i know if im even real

     wondering if you are real is one of the strongest indicators of being real

3.21.18  7:25 pm   I was just at a goodwill checking out their CD bin, and I picked up a copy of Control by janet jackson. And when I'm at the register the cashier looks at me and says 'do you actually like janet jackson?' and started to laugh.. and I'm just like 'uh, yeah sure' and he just laughs again and says in a very blatantly sarcastic tone 'well, alright then'.... What the fuck was that all about? Did I miss the memo that I'm not allowed to be a janet jackson fan or something? 

     no, this person fucked up, in 2 ways. they discouraged someone from buying something from their store, and also janet jackson's music is great

     the vegetable

3.21.18  6:59 pm   i just got invited to a highschool party for the first time, what are some topics i could bring up if there's nothing to talk about? i know people like small talk but i'm not sure what counts as small talk

     you will never know what's relevant until you get there. try to focus on things you never could have known before you had gotten there
